jobAttributes.description:
The iReceptor Junction AA list search Analysis App searches the junction_aa field of the sequences selected for the provided list of Junction AA sequences.

Notes:

  • The list of Junction AA sequences should be provided on a single, comma separated line.
  • The Junction AA search is an exact match for the entire junction. Substring searches are not supported (e.g. 'CASSYSDTGELFF, CASSDSDTGELFF, CASSYGDTGELFF, CASSDGDTGELFF').
  • Important: Sequence queries performed on the sequence page are ignored, since they can conflict with each other. The analysis App will run on all sequence data and ignore sequence filters if they have been applied, applying only the Junction AA filters required by the list provided.

appArgs.name: junction_aa_list
appArgs.description: The list of Junction AA sequences to use (single line, comma separated), for example 'CASSYSDTGELFF, CASSDSDTGELFF, CASSYGDTGELFF, CASSDGDTGELFF'.
